Text.val: @This program checks if the finance does not exceed maximum finance.(daily prog)
22.03.2011 GB SCR16256 Replaced the GB002 by the GB902
18.02.2009 GB SCR14411 Added two parameter for call GB101
01.09.2008 SH SCR13915 Replaced LimitsAndConc client fields by Limit fields
27.03.2007 SH SCR12262 Step1 Added /100 where CLNT402_ADVANCE is used
Step 1: Test if maximum finance is exceeded

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA_ACTAFACTORING, INVA_ACTARETENTION from :1/INVO, :1/INVA, :1/CLNT where INVO_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and INVO_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_NO = INVA_NO and INVA_CURRENCY = ':4' and INVO_MARKCODESPEC = 0 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVA_ACTAFACTORING > 0 order by INVO_NO desc for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- If still V.TOBOOKH > 0 then obtain the next INVO row, else abort task

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_MARKCODESPEC, INVA_ACTASPECIAL from :1/INVO, :1/INVA, :1/CLNT where INVO_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and INVO_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT107_LIMITS_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT107_LIMITS_CLNTNO = :3 and INVO_NO = INVA_NO and INVA_CURRENCY = ':4' and INVO_MARKCODESPEC = :5 and INVO_AACTUALI > 0 and INVA_ACTASPECIAL > 0 order by INVO_NO desc for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: -- If still V.TOBOOKH > 0 then obtain the next INVO row, else abort task
